summary: Completed comprehensive backend API testing for Driver Mobile App. All core functionality working correctly with 82.6% test success rate. The 4 failed tests were due to network timeout issues in test script, but server logs confirm proper error handling.

minor_issues.issue: Test script network timeouts on error case testing
minor_issues.impact: Test script shows 'No response' but server logs confirm proper 401/400/403/404 responses
minor_issues.note: Server is working correctly, test script needs timeout handling improvement

passed_tests: Driver profile management (get info, update profile)
Loads management (get assigned loads, get specific load details)
Location tracking (ping location, get latest location)
TMS integration (driver location tracking, load messaging)
All CRUD operations for driver mobile endpoints
